section.heading: Community education.

para.text: Public education about the risks of lead water service lines, including for residents who are non-English speakers or have a low level of literacy; and
Upon request, annual free lead test kits to property owners and lessees of commercial and residential buildings.

Law 22-241 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been implemented.
